item.title: 世界银行下调泰国经济增长预期，支持央行维持利率稳定
item.description: 世界银行下调了对泰国经济增长的预测，理由是政府 135 亿美元的经济刺激计划存在不确定性，但支持中央银行保持政策利率稳定的立场。【原文：The World Bank trimmed its growth forecast for Thailand, citing uncertainties over the government’s $13.5 billion stimulus plan, but backed the central bank’s stance in keeping the policy rate steady.】

item.title: 贝恩印度贷款公司计划在上市前将投资组合扩大一倍
item.description: 贝恩资本（Bain Capital）从阿达尼集团（Adani Group）手中收购的印度影子贷款公司 Tyger Capital Pvt Ltd. 正准备在下一财年在印度证券交易所上市，并寻求将其贷款组合翻一番。【原文：Tyger Capital Pvt Ltd., the Indian shadow lender Bain Capital bought from the Adani Group, is seeking to double its loan portfolio as it prepares to list on India’s stock exchanges in the next fiscal year.】

item.title: 孟加拉国将向中国申请 50 亿美元贷款以促进经济发展
item.description: 孟加拉国央行行长表示，孟加拉国正在与中国商谈约 50 亿美元的贷款事宜，以增加该国日益减少的外汇储备，从而拉近这个南亚国家与北京的距离。【原文：Bangladesh is in talks with China for a loan of about $5 billion to bolster the nation’s dwindling foreign-exchange reserves, the central bank governor said, drawing the South Asian country closer to Beijing.】

item.title: Edelweiss 警告：印度长债交易已变得拥挤不堪
item.description: 一位印度债券基金经理说，印度 30 年期债券的涨势已经过头，因为交易员们夸大了对政策性降息和外国基金增加购买的预期。【原文：An Indian bond fund manager says a rally in the nation’s 30-year bonds has gone too far, as traders hyped up expectations for policy rate cuts and increased purchases by foreign funds.】

item.title: 开始一天生活所需的五件事 欧洲
item.description:
及时了解市场监测情况

Get up to speed with what the markets are monitoring

】

item.title: 澳大利亚最大养老基金借科技股热潮转向股票投资
item.description: 澳大利亚最大的养老基金 AustralianSuper 正在将资金转向股票，因为预计人工智能将推动科技股进一步上涨。【原文：AustralianSuper, the country’s largest pension fund, is shifting money into equities on the expectation that artificial intelligence will fuel further gains in tech stocks.】

item.title: 拜登的国庆节市场雨过天晴
item.description:
自总统辩论灾难以来，博彩和债券提供了关于特朗普2.0胜算的冷酷无情的真相。【原文：

Betting and bonds deliver cold, harsh truths about the odds of Trump 2.0 since the presidential debate disaster.

】

item.title: 美国住房可负担性降至 2007 年以来最低点
item.description: 对于美国的普通收入者来说，拥有一套住房的负担能力比 17 年来任何时候都要低。【原文：Owning a house is less affordable for average earners in the US than at anytime in 17 years.】

item.title: 欧洲核复兴缺乏关键要素：熟练工人
item.description:
为能源转型建造反应堆需要数十万名焊工、工程师和规划人员。【原文：

Hundreds of thousands of welders, engineers and planners are needed to build reactors for the energy transition.

】

item.title: 泰国考虑终止长达 52 年的午后禁酒令以吸引游客
item.description: 泰国旅游业因成本上升和消费疲软而举步维艰，在旅游业的呼吁下，泰国总理沙维信（Srettha Thavisin）可能会终止长达 52 年之久的午后售酒禁令。【原文：Thai Prime Minister Srettha Thavisin may end a 52-year-old ban on afternoon alcohol sales after appeals from the tourism industry, which is struggling with rising costs and weak consumer spending.】

item.title: 人工智能需求激增，韩国大幅上调经济增长预期
item.description: 由于全球对人工智能的蓬勃需求推动韩国半导体出口达到创纪录的水平，韩国大幅上调了经济增长预期。【原文：South Korea revised its economic growth forecast sharply higher as booming global demand for artificial intelligence drives its semiconductor exports to record levels.】

item.title: 中国推出支持民营企业的新债券计划
item.description: 中国已推出一项计划，帮助私营企业通过出售公司债券筹集资金，以提振业界信心，支持经济发展。【原文：China has introduced a program to help private companies raise funds via corporate bond sales, as it seeks to boost confidence in the sector to support the economy.】

item.title: HDFC 银行潜在的 40 亿美元购买狂潮支撑印度股市上涨
item.description: 在交易日开始之前，我们为您带来可能影响市场的重要新闻和事件摘要。【原文：Before the trading day starts we bring you a digest of the key news and events that are likely to move markets.】

item.title: 弗里斯兰坎皮纳将试行价值 40 亿美元的印尼午餐计划
item.description: 印尼即将上任的政府将与荷兰乳制品生产商皇家弗里斯兰坎皮纳公司（Royal FrieslandCampina NV）在当地的分支机构及其他公司合作，试行免费午餐计划。【原文：Indonesia’s incoming government will work with the local unit of Dutch dairy producer Royal FrieslandCampina NV, among other companies, to trial its free lunch program.】

item.title: 中国《建筑时报》：债务谈判中的 "起风听证会 "被推迟
item.description: 据一名法官称，香港法院将时代中国控股有限公司（Times China Holdings Ltd.）的首次清盘聆讯延期至 7 月 31 日，以使呈请人有更多时间考虑这家违约建筑商的债务提议。【原文：A Hong Kong court adjourned the first winding-up hearing of Times China Holdings Ltd. to July 31, to give the petitioner more time to consider the defaulted builder’s debt proposal, according to a judge.】

item.title: 中国牛肉价格暴跌，高端肉类需求减弱
item.description: 中国牛肉市场正面临着一个难题。【原文：The Chinese beef market is facing a conundrum.】

item.title: 对冲基金秘密做空阿达尼的逐笔披露
item.description: 一名激进的做空者、一家纽约对冲基金、一家毛里求斯投资机构和一名与印度一家大银行有关联的经纪人：所有这些人都在世界上最具破坏性的做空者攻击事件中扮演了角色。【原文：An activist short-seller, a New York hedge fund, a Mauritius-based investment vehicle and a broker tied to a big Indian bank: All played a role in one of the most-damaging short-seller attacks anywhere in the world.】

item.title: 六家与新加坡洗钱案有关的家族办公室基金获得税收减免
item.description: 与新加坡 30 亿新元（22 亿美元）洗钱案有关的六个单一家族办公室基金获得了新加坡金融管理局的税收优惠。【原文：Six single family office funds linked to a S$3 billion ($2.2 billion) money laundering case in Singapore have received tax incentives from the Monetary Authority of Singapore.】

item.title: 日本改版钞票，可能会推出床垫现金
item.description: 日本自 2004 年以来首次发行了新设计的纸币，此举可能会小幅提振经济，同时有可能促使一些现金囤积者将钱用于投资，而不是藏在床垫下。【原文：Japan issued newly designed banknotes for the first time since 2004 in a move that may provide a small boost to the economy while potentially nudging some cash hoarders to invest money instead of stashing it under the mattress.】

item.title: 开始一天生活所需的五件事：亚洲（主模板）
item.description: 早上好兴登堡从阿达尼溃败中获利微薄。莫迪访问俄罗斯，与普京亲近。中台紧张局势升级。市场动态如下— Sebastian Boyd【原文：Good morning. Hindenburg made a tiny profit from Adani rout. Modi to cozy up to Putin with Russia visit. China-Taiwan tensions ratchet up a notch. Here’s what’s moving markets — Sebastian Boyd】

item.title: 美国库存出现大幅减少迹象，石油走高
item.description: 由于有迹象表明美国原油库存大幅减少，石油攀升至两个月高点附近。【原文：Oil climbed to trade near a two-month high on signs of a significant drawdown in US crude stockpiles.】

item.title: 加拿大考虑封锁工厂以回击中国电动汽车
item.description: 加拿大总理贾斯汀-特鲁多（Justin Trudeau）的政府公布了阻止中国制造的电动汽车进入加拿大市场的备选方案，包括对进口电动汽车征收关税和阻止中国对加拿大新工厂的投资。【原文：Prime Minister Justin Trudeau’s government has published options it will consider for deterring Chinese-made electric vehicles from accessing the Canadian market, including putting tariffs on imported and blocking Chinese investment in new Canadian factories.】

item.title: S&P 500指数收于5500点上方，亚洲股市上涨：市场综述
item.description: 亚洲股市将追随华尔街破纪录的涨势，因为在杰罗姆-鲍威尔（Jerome Powell）发出美国重回通货紧缩轨道的信号后，交易员们正在权衡美联储降息的前景。【原文：Stocks in Asia are set to follow a record-breaking rally on Wall Street as traders weighed prospects for Federal Reserve rate cuts after Jerome Powell cited signals the US is back on a disinflationary path.】

item.title: Citgo 母公司出售听证会推迟，特别主事人权衡出价
item.description: 一名联邦法官推迟了 Citgo 石油公司母公司的出售听证会，给法院指定的特别主事人更多的时间来评估对美国最大炼油商之一控制权的竞标。【原文：A federal judge pushed back a hearing for the sale of Citgo Petroleum Corp.’s parent company, giving a court-appointed special master more time to evaluate bids for control of one of the largest oil refiners in the US.】

item.title: 贝莱德的 Preqin 交易引发穆迪对债务负担的担忧
item.description: 贝莱德公司最近的一系列交易，包括本周以 32 亿美元收购 Preqin，引发了穆迪公司（Moody's Corp）对这家基金管理公司债务负担的担忧。【原文：BlackRock Inc.’s recent spate of deals — including this week’s acquisition of Preqin for $3.2 billion — is prompting concerns at Moody’s Corp. about the money manager’s debt burden.】

item.title: 交易员纷纷押注特朗普推动美国国债收益率上升
item.description: 随着华尔街开始为唐纳德-特朗普可能重返白宫做出调整，27 万亿美元国债市场的交易员们正押注长期债券收益率将走高。【原文：Traders in the $27 trillion Treasury market are betting on higher long-term bond yields as Wall Street starts to adjust for Donald Trump’s potential return to the White House.】

item.title: 萨贝斯普私有化引来 53 亿美元基金需求
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，投资者已表示有兴趣购买巴西水务公司 Sabesp 价值超过 300 亿雷亚尔（约合 53 亿美元）的股票，这将是今年拉丁美洲最大的一次股票发行。【原文：Investors have signaled interest in scooping up more than 30 billion reais ($5.3 billion) worth of shares in Brazilian water utility Sabesp — far more than what’s available for sale — in what’s expected to be the largest Latin America equity offering this year, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 布拉德-雅各布斯计划如何彻底改变建筑用品分销模式
item.description:
以及他将如何花费 45 亿美元。【原文：

And how he’ll spend $4.5 billion.

】

item.title: Element Solutions 首席执行官看好并购和人工智能的发展机遇
item.description: Element Solutions Inc.首席执行官本杰明-格里克利希（Benjamin Gliklich）说，他看到了 "增量并购的机会"，在保持工业和特种化学品业务的同时，建立先进电子业务。【原文：Element Solutions Inc. Chief Executive Officer Benjamin Gliklich said he sees “an opportunity for incremental M&A” to build its advanced electronics business while holding onto its industrial and specialty chemicals operations.】

item.title: 稳定币发行商 Paxos 任命 Lim 为新加坡执行董事
item.description: Paxos Trust Co.任命Jeannie Lim为稳定币发行商Paxos Singapore的执行董事，Jeannie Lim最近的职务是新加坡Meta Platforms Inc.的消息支付主管。【原文：Paxos Trust Co. named Jeannie Lim, who was most recently head of messaging payments at Meta Platforms Inc. in Singapore, as the stablecoin issuer’s executive director at Paxos Singapore.】
